tool_description: 電気自動車（EV）を移動手段として、ドアtoドアの最適な移動経路・料金を算出できます。検索条件に合致する電気自動車充電スタンド情報も取得できます。Calculate the optimal route and highway tolls for electric vehicles. In addition, you can get information on electric vehicle charging stations that match your search conditions.
name: NAVITIME EV Charging Spots and Route
title: NAVITIME EV Charging Spots and Route
tool_name: NAVITIME EV Charging Spots and Route

api_list.name: charging_station
api_list.description: 住所コードや緯度経度、フリーワードを指定して条件に合致する電気自動車充電スタンドを検索します。

optional_parameters.name: address
optional_parameters.description:
Address code.

Please be sure to specify either 'word', 'address', or 'code'.

optional_parameters.name: coord
optional_parameters.description:
Latitude and longitude of the reference point for the search.

Please be sure to specify either 'word', 'address', or 'code'.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional information to be output, multiple specifications can be specified, separated by periods
(detail: detailed information, opening_hours: business hours information)

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description:
Skips a given number of first data.
(Minimum value: 0, Maximum value: 2000, Default value: 0)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: payment
optional_parameters.description:
Narrow down your search to only the specified fee terms.
(pay: paid, conditional_free: conditionally free, free: free)

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description:
Search range (unit: m)
Available only when 'coord' is specified
Maximum value: 100000

optional_parameters.name: word
optional_parameters.description:
Search word.

Please be sure to specify either 'word', 'address', or 'code'.

optional_parameters.name: reservation
optional_parameters.description:
Narrow down to specified booking conditions only
(true: advance reservation required, 
false: no advance reservation required)

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Number of electric vehicle charging station data outputs
(Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 100)

api_list.name: route_ev_car
api_list.description:
電気自動車（EV）を移動手段として、最適なルート・料金を検索します。
指定した電費に基づいた移動区間ごとの消費電費を取得できます。

required_parameters.name: power_cost
required_parameters.description:
Electricity cost (JSON representation of each mode)
Numeric value (unit: Wh/km)

optional_parameters.name: avoid_etc_only
optional_parameters.description:
Avoid ETC toll booths
 (true : avoid ETC toll booths)
false : do not avoid ETC toll booths)

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex.2020-04-01T09:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: wide
optional_parameters.description:
Consider the width of the road 
(unuse: do not consider the width of the road)
use : consider the width of the road
more_use : actively consider the width of the road)

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: shape
optional_parameters.description:
true: output the shape
false: do not output the shape

optional_parameters.name: etc
optional_parameters.description:
ETC fee 
(use : ETC fee calculation considering time)
unuse : do not calculate ETC fee taking time into account)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)

Point information for guiding progress information at intersections, etc.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
Output order.
(total_distance: total movement distance, time: required time)

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search condition
(recommend: recommended)
toll_time: Toll road priority, time priority
toll_distance: toll road priority, distance priority
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_only: free road use)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description:
Smart IC consideration.
(unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description:
Destination.
(specified：maximum number of 50 points
optimal：maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description:
Ferry priority search.
(unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: use_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: unuse_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID not to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

api_list.name: fare_table
api_list.description: Return fare divisions including route search results.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-ev-charging-spots-and-route.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-ev-charging-spots-and-route.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://navitime-ev-charging-spots-and-route.p.rapidapi.com/fare_table"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "navitime-ev-charging-spots-and-route.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: shape_ev_car
api_list.description: 地図にルート線を描画するためのルート形状を取得します。

optional_parameters.name: datum
optional_parameters.description:
Geodetic system of latitude and longitude.
(wgs84: World Geodetic System (default), tokyo: Old Japan Geodetic System)

optional_parameters.name: wide
optional_parameters.description:
Consider the width of the road
 (unuse: do not consider the width of the road
use : consider the width of the road
more_use : actively consider the width of the road)

optional_parameters.name: start_time
optional_parameters.description:
Departure time.
(ex.2020-04-01T09:00:00)

optional_parameters.name: condition
optional_parameters.description:
Route search condition
(recommend: recommended (default),
toll_time: toll road use and time priority, 
toll_distance: toll road use and distance priority, 
free_time: free road use and time priority, 
free_distance: free road use and  distance priority, 
free_only: free road use)

optional_parameters.name: use_road
optional_parameters.description:
Road ID to use.
Can be specified multiple times, separated by a period.

optional_parameters.name: avoid_etc_only
optional_parameters.description:
Avoid ETC toll booths (true : avoid ETC toll booths)
false : do not avoid ETC toll booths)

optional_parameters.name: options
optional_parameters.description:
Additional output information.
(turn_by_turn: turn-by-turn information)

Point information for guiding progress information at intersections, etc.

optional_parameters.name: coord_unit
optional_parameters.description:
The unit of latitude and longitude included in the output data.
(degree: decimal system of degrees (default), millisec: milliseconds)

optional_parameters.name: ferry
optional_parameters.description:
Ferry priority search.
(unuse : do not use ferries, use : use ferries, more_use : use ferries first)

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description:
Output order.
(total_distance: total movement distance, time: required time)

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format (geojson: GeoJSON format (default), json: JSON format)

optional_parameters.name: smart_ic
optional_parameters.description:
Smart IC consideration.
(unuse : not considering smart IC, use : considering smart IC)

optional_parameters.name: via
optional_parameters.description:
Destination.
(maximum number of 10 points)

optional_parameters.name: etc
optional_parameters.description:
ETC fee calculation (use : ETC fee calculation considering time)
unuse : do not calculate ETC fee taking time into account)

optional_parameters.name: no
optional_parameters.description:
Route Number.
When multiple routes are being returned, one route must be identified.

Specifies the route number to be output. If not specified, the first route will be selected.

optional_parameters.name: via_type
optional_parameters.description:
Routing mode.
(specified: specified order, optimal: optimal order)
